name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、等候原理、存貨模式、專案管理、模擬等。
schedule:
1. Basic Modeling in LP
2. Network Optimization Models
3. Project Management PERT/CPM
4. Deterministic Dynamic Programming
5. Integer Programming 
6. Nonlinear Programming
7. Game Theory
8. Decision Analysis
9. Markov Chain
10. Application of Queueing Theory and Simulation
